Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text1
Text_English: Well hello stranger, it's good to see you again.
Text_Korean:
아니 이게 누구야!
이렇게 다시 만나다니 매우 반갑군.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text2
Text_English:
Oh! This isn't the time for this.
A new enemy has polluted the Holy Ground.
We must defeat the enemies and cleanse the area.
Text_Korean:
음… 그 표정은 설마, 이 위대한 마법사를 기억 못 하는 거요?
섭섭하지만 세월이 많이 지났으니 그럴 수도 있겠지.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text3
Text_English:
Oh! This isn't the time for this.
A new enemy has polluted the Holy Ground.
We must defeat the enemies and cleanse the area.
Text_Korean:
참! 이럴 때가 아니지. 새로운 적이 성역을 오염시켰소.
우리는 적을 물리치고 성역을 정화해야 하오.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text4
Text_English:
You didn’t forget how to move, did you?
I marked it just in case, so go find the light!
Text_Korean:
설마 이동하는 것 정도는 잊지 않았겠지?
혹시 몰라 내 친절하게 표시해 놓았으니 빛을 찾아가시오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text5
Text_English: These clowns are your first enemies?
Text_Korean: 처음 나타난 적이 이런 우스꽝스러운 놈들이라니!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text6
Text_English:
Seems like you still got it.
But even I can take care of this much.
Text_Korean:
녹슬지 않은 것 같군.
하지만 이런 잔챙이들은 나도 해치울 수 있지.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text7
Text_English:
Now there are some stronger enemies,
beat them to prove your strength.
Text_Korean:
이번에 좀 더 강한 놈들이 덤비는군!
저 놈들을 물리친다면 실력을 인정하지.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text8
Text_English: GREAT WORK! 1, 2, 123, Remember this rhythm.
Text_Korean:
오! 멋진 실력이야.
탁 타! 타닥 타! 이 리듬을 꼭 기억하시오.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text9
Text_English:
It's an ambush! Use your counterattack!
Counterattack is an important skill
that can change the tide of the battle.
Text_Korean: 첫 번째 길을 열었군. 잘했소.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text10
Text_English:
Counterattacking is very crucial in combat.
Trust your instincts and counterattack with perfect timing.
Text_Korean:
이번 전투에 필요한 것은
이 세계에서 정말 중요한 반격이오.
감각을 떠올려 정확한 타이밍으로 반격해보시오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text11
Text_English: Counterattack now!
Text_Korean: 지금이 바로 그 타이밍이오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text12
Text_English:
Excellent!
Counterattacks are a bit hard, but it can turn the tides of battle.
Text_Korean:
훌륭하오! 반격은 조금 어렵지만 전투를 뒤집을 수 있으니
익혀두시오.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text13
Text_English:
Pathfinder, arise.
This is just a nightmare.
Text_Korean: 두 번째도 성공이군. 훌륭하오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text14
Text_English:
You can defeat multiple enemies with the skill buttons.
Destroy everything!
Text_Korean:
스킬 버튼을 사용하면 많은 적을 쉽게 무찌를 수 있소.
모두 파괴하시오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text15
Text_English: Well uh…you… shouldn’t have broken that….
Text_Korean: 그, 그것까지 부수면….

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text16
Text_English: To open a blocked path, you must suppress your enemy.
Text_Korean: 막힌 길을 열려면 적을 제압해서 조종해야 하오.

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text17
Text_English: Now! Now! Press the button to suppress!
Text_Korean: 지금! 버튼을 눌러 제압하시오!

Name: Dialog_Tutorial01_Text18
Text_English:
Th-that monster polluted the Holy ground!
We have to gather our power to defeat it.
Text_Korean:
저, 저 괴물이 성역을 오염시켰소!
모두의 힘을 모아 거대한 적을 물리치시오!

Name: Dialog_Act0101_Text1
Text_English: What is happening?
Text_Korean: 활기에 가득 찼던 도시가 대체 왜…?

Name: Dialog_Act0101_Text2
Text_English: Demons are besieging the city!
Text_Korean: 이 악마들이 루에모스를 차단하고 있었군!

Name: Dialog_Act0101_Text3
Text_English:
Mortal,
are you ready to sacrifice yourself?
Text_Korean:
인간이여,
피와 살을 바칠 준비가 되었는가?

Name: Dialog_Act0101_Text4
Text_English: You shall also suffer from Rachel's curse.
Text_Korean: 너에게도 라헬의 저주가 있을 것이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text1
Text_English:
Thank you for helping me.
Keep your wits about you on this road.
Text_Korean:
부탁을 들어주어 고맙네.
어떤 위험이 기다리고 있을지 모르니 조심하게.

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text2
Text_English: They’re all dead…
Text_Korean: 병사들의 시체가…

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text3
Text_English: How precious!
Text_Korean: 안녕?

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text4
Text_English: Are you looking for them, too?
Text_Korean: 어머! 너도 그놈들을 찾고 있는 거야?

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text5
Text_English: Stop!
Text_Korean: 그만둬!

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text6
Text_English: I’m afraid you’re too late!
Text_Korean: 누가 먼저 찾는지 볼까?

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text7
Text_English:
That wicked thing Rahel, is also looking for
Lord Alfrid! Let’s hurry!
Text_Korean:
라헬! 저 사악한 자도 알프리드 님을 찾고 있는 거야!
서두르세!

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text8
Text_English: See you again soon!
Text_Korean: 그럼 먼저 갈게.

Name: Dialog_Act0102_Text9
Text_English: Bitten by the prey…
Text_Korean: 사냥감에게 목을 물리다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text1
Text_English: Look around to find some clues!
Text_Korean: 단서를 찾을 수 있도록 주의를 기울이게!

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text2
Text_English: Are you from Elysium?
Text_Korean: 엘리시움에서 온 자인가?

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text3
Text_English: So you’re Gote…?
Text_Korean: 당신이 고트…?

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text4
Text_English: Yes, follow me!
Text_Korean: 맞아! 일단 날 따라와 줘!

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text5
Text_English: I was escorting Lord Alfrid when we were ambushed….
Text_Korean: 영주님과 엘리시움으로 피신 도중 습격을 받았지.

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text6
Text_English:
I lost my liege in the chaos.
You must help me find him, I beg of you!
Text_Korean:
그 이후 영주님의 행방을 알 수 없어.
날 좀 도와줘.

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text7
Text_English: The city is ours!
Text_Korean: 도시는 이제 우리 것이닷!

Name: Dialog_Act0103_Text8
Text_English: You cannot stop us…
Text_Korean: 우리를 막을 수 없을 것이다….

Name: Dialog_Act0104_Text1
Text_English: Now lord Alfried! Hahaha!
Text_Korean: 이제 영주만 남았군.

Name: Dialog_Act0104_Text2
Text_English: You will pay if you hurt him, Rahel! I am warning you!
Text_Korean: 라헬! 고트를 해친다면 똑같이 갚아줄 것이다!

Name: Dialog_Act0104_Text3
Text_English: Damn, I lost her after she took Gote towards the main square.
Text_Korean:
제길! 놓쳤군.
라헬이 고트를 끌고 간 방향은 중앙 광장 쪽일세.

Name: Dialog_Act0104_Text4
Text_English: Let me pierce your heart!
Text_Korean: 심장을 꿰뚫어주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0104_Text5
Text_English: Darkness shall take over…
Text_Korean: 어둠에 삼켜지리라….

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text1
Text_English: Hello!
Text_Korean: 안녕?

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text2
Text_English: I love a good heroic last stand.
Text_Korean: 눈물겨운 전우애군. 언제까지 버틸 수 있을까?

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text3
Text_English: How exciting! Yes! Laugh!
Text_Korean: 흥분되게 하네. 좀 더 날뛰어 봐! 아하하하!

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text4
Text_English: Oh, how exhilarating, darling. I have a gift for you.
Text_Korean: 아! 반해버렸어. 그럼 선물을 줄게.

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text5
Text_English: S… Stooop!!! Nooo!
Text_Korean: 그, 그만둬! 으아악!

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text6
Text_English: I would love to stay and chat, but I must go. Kisses!
Text_Korean: 아쉽지만 난 영주를 찾으러 가볼게.

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text7
Text_English: Pl…ease… Find… lord… Alfrid…
Text_Korean: 부디 영주님을…

Name: Dialog_Act0105_Text8
Text_English: You cannot run!
Text_Korean: 빠져나갈 수 없을 것이다!

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text1
Text_English: I’m from Luemos and was the lieutenant for Lord Alfrid.
Text_Korean:
난 루에모스 출신일세.
알프리드 님을 모시던 부관이었지.

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text2
Text_English: Gote was my aide. He was like a brother to me.
Text_Korean: 고트는 내 후임이었네. 나와 형제 같은 사이였어.

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text3
Text_English: This way…
Text_Korean: 이쪽이에요….

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text4
Text_English: Who is that? I wonder if they know where Lord Alrid is?
Text_Korean:
저 환영은 누구지?
알프리드 님의 행방을 알려주는 걸까?

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text5
Text_English: Let’s follow it. It's where Rahel flew to.
Text_Korean: 일단 따라가세. 라헬이 날아간 방향과도 일치해.

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text6
Text_English: I like your eyes. Let me take them!
Text_Korean: 눈이 마음에 드는구나! 내가 가지겠다!

Name: Dialog_Act0106_Text7
Text_English: You cannot stop the ritual…
Text_Korean: 의식은 막을 수 없다….

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text1
Text_English: Where, oh, where is that old geezer?
Text_Korean: 이 늙은이는 대체 어디 있는 거야?

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text2
Text_English: Oh did you kill Gote already?
Text_Korean: 뭐야, 너 동료를 죽였어? 죽인 거야?

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text3
Text_English: That Demon shouldn’t have done that!
Text_Korean: 저 악마가 입에 담아서는 안 될 말을 하다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text4
Text_English:
Fortunately, it seems Rahel hasn’t found him yet either.
There’s still hope!
Text_Korean:
하지만 라헬도 아직 찾지 못한 것 같군.
이 기회를 살리도록 하세!

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text5
Text_English: Human! You cannot go further.
Text_Korean: 인간! 더 이상 갈 수 없다

Name: Dialog_Act0107_Text6
Text_English: The darkness shall swallow the light.
Text_Korean: 빛은 어둠으로 물들 것이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text1
Text_English: Wait, something’s not right. Don't let your guard down.
Text_Korean: 왠지 소름 돋는군. 불길한 기분이 드네. 조심하게.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text2
Text_English: Will you just die already?
Text_Korean: 아직도 살아 있는 거야?!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text3
Text_English: When the time comes, she will die by my hand.
Text_Korean: 할 수 있다면 라헬과의 악연을 끊어버리고 싶네.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text4
Text_English: You annoying pest!
Text_Korean: 질척대지 말고 떨어져!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text5
Text_English: You still haven’t taken care of this?
Text_Korean: 아직도 처리하지 못한 건가?

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text6
Text_English: Ha! You're in no position to question me.
Text_Korean: 흥! 넌 늙은이나 잘 처리해.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text7
Text_English: Hmmph!
Text_Korean: 흥!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text8
Text_English: Isn't that Caligula…?!
Text_Korean: 저 자는 칼리굴라…?!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text9
Text_English: Oh look, it’s time for you to die!
Text_Korean: 이제 친구에게 보내줄게.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text10
Text_English: Caligula's behind all this, I am just a pawn….
Text_Korean: 나, 난 아니야. 다 칼리굴라 계획이야!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text11
Text_English: He's the one who gave us the city!
Text_Korean: 그가 우리에게 도시를 넘겼다고!

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text12
Text_English: Shut up.
Text_Korean: 그만 닥쳐.

Name: Dialog_Act0108_Text13
Text_English: Funny thing, Alfrid’s probably rotting as we speak….
Text_Korean: 흥, 지금쯤 그의 손에 영주는…

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text1
Text_English:
Everyone wanted to exile Caligula,
but Lord Alfrid was against it.
Text_Korean:
모두가 칼리굴라를 쫓아내자고 했지만
알프리드 님이 반대하셨네.

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text2
Text_English: My lord’s kindness was answered with treachery!
Text_Korean: 끝까지 사람을 믿은 어진 성품이 배신당한 걸세.

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text3
Text_English: What is he after?
Text_Korean: 칼리굴라의 목적은 대체 무엇일까?

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text4
Text_English: We, we were too late… I'm sorry Gote.
Text_Korean: 이미 늦었어… 고트 미안하네….

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text5
Text_English: This arrow shall pierce your heart!
Text_Korean: 화살이 심장을 꿰뚫으리라!

Name: Dialog_Act0109_Text6
Text_English: The ritual has begun…
Text_Korean: 의식은 시작됐다…

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text1
Text_English: I wonder what Caligula was promised for opening the gate….
Text_Korean: 칼리굴라는 악마에게 뭘 받은 거지? 방심할 수 없군.

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text2
Text_English: Save her…
Text_Korean: 그분을 구하세요….

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text3
Text_English: To whom is she referring to?
Text_Korean: 그분? 누굴 말하는 거지?

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text4
Text_English: This is it! Prepare for battle!
Text_Korean: 마지막 관문일세! 결전을 준비하게!

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text5
Text_English: Now! The Dark power…!
Text_Korean: 어둠의 힘을….!

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text6
Text_English: This is the power of darkness!
Text_Korean: 이것이 어둠의 힘인가!

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text7
Text_English: W-what! What is this? Did they betray me? Nooo!
Text_Korean: 어? 이, 이게 뭐야? 날 속였나…? 으아아아아….

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text8
Text_English: Lucci…
Text_Korean: 루치…

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text9
Text_English: How dare you desecrate the ritual? Die!
Text_Korean: 의식을 망치려 하다니 죽어라!

Name: Dialog_Act0110_Text10
Text_English: The ritual has already begun…
Text_Korean: 이미 의식은 시작됐다….

Name: Dialog_Act0201_Text1
Text_English: This corruption is more powerful than I remember… the darkness within me is growing.
Text_Korean:
백 년 전보다 강력한 타락의 힘이에요.
제 안의 절대 어둠이 강해지고 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0201_Text2
Text_English: A hundred years ago, an evil force had invaded the Fairy Forest.
Text_Korean: 백 년 전 요정의 숲을 오염시키려는 악의 침공이 있었어요

Name: Dialog_Act0201_Text3
Text_English: Lilith and I fought together to protect it.
Text_Korean: 저는 동료 릴리스와 숲을 지키기 위해 싸웠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0201_Text4
Text_English:
I fear I cannot go with you anymore.
I must call Bella before I lose control.
Text_Korean:
으윽! 더 이상 함께하는 건 어렵겠군요.
대신 숲의 관리인 벨라를 부르겠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text1
Text_English:
This corrupted odor has engulfed our forest.
I hope the fairies are okay….
Text_Korean: 타락의 악취가 짙군요! 요정들이 무사해야 할 텐데….

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text2
Text_English:
That demon reeks of corruption!
It’s no ordinary demon.
Text_Korean:
저 악마, 타락의 악취가 강해요.
보통 악마가 아닌 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text3
Text_English: Wow! Interesting…
Text_Korean: 호오 이것 봐라….

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text4
Text_English: You’re pretty strong!
Text_Korean: 제법 강하네…

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text5
Text_English: Well, if you insist, I'll go with you! Let's go!
Text_Korean: 좋아! 특별히 내가 같이 가줄게! 출발!

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text6
Text_English: A ghostly demon is spreading the Corruption in the forest!
Text_Korean: 고스트라는 악마가 숲에 타락의 힘을 퍼뜨리고 있어.

Name: Dialog_Act0202_Text7
Text_English: If you protect me, you’ll be rewarded by my master!
Text_Korean: 아리따운 나를 지켜주면 숲의 주인께 말해서 큰 상을 줄게

Name: Dialog_Act0203_Text1
Text_English: I can feel Lilith’s presence. I think she’s here.
Text_Korean: 릴리스님의 기운이 느껴져. 이곳에 계신 것 같아.

Name: Dialog_Act0203_Text2
Text_English: Nisse, the Corruption is beginning to eat at me. Hurry!
Text_Korean: 니스, 타락이 나를 잠식하기 시작했어. 서둘러 줘.

Name: Dialog_Act0203_Text3
Text_English: Corruption? Lilith!
Text_Korean: 타락이라니요? 릴리스님!

Name: Dialog_Act0203_Text4
Text_English:
What should we do?
The ghost implanted the Seed of Corruption within Lilith!
Text_Korean: 어떡해! 고스트가 릴리스님께 타락의 씨앗을 심었나 봐.

Name: Dialog_Act0203_Text5
Text_English:
Forget about Rio and Pang for now,
we need to help Lilith!
Text_Korean:
다른 두 녀석이 문제가 아니야.
빨리 릴리스님께 가야 해!

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text1
Text_English: We must protect Nice from Ghost.
Text_Korean: 고스트가 나타날지 모르니 니스를 잘 지켜야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text2
Text_English: Is that Lilith? There is a sense of urgency in her voice.
Text_Korean: 어? 릴리스님의 소리가… 뭔가 다급하신 것 같아.

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text3
Text_English: The Fey Gate has closed, you must open it again! AH!
Text_Korean: 요정의 문이 닫혔어. 너희가 다시 열어야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text4
Text_English: Perhaps it's not too late…
Text_Korean: 아직 잠식되지 않았나….

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text5
Text_English: Find Rio and Pang! Hurry!
Text_Korean: 리오와 팡을 찾아! 어서!

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text6
Text_English: How dare you?
Text_Korean: 감히….!

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text7
Text_English: Lilith!
Text_Korean: 릴리스님!

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text8
Text_English: We must hurry…
Text_Korean: 서둘러야겠군….

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text9
Text_English: Quick! Let's go now!
Text_Korean: 어서 가자! 빨리! 빨리!

Name: Dialog_Act0204_Text10
Text_English: Get away!
Text_Korean: 음! 피해!

Name: Dialog_Act0205_Text1
Text_English: The corruption here is intense…
Text_Korean: 수상해… 다른 곳 보다 타락의 힘이 강하게 느껴져.

Name: Dialog_Act0205_Text2
Text_English:
This must be a trap by Ghost!
It's blocking us from reaching Lilith!
Text_Korean:
고스트의 함정인 것 같아!
릴리스님께 갈 수 없도록 막으려는 거야!

Name: Dialog_Act0205_Text3
Text_English: Accept your death…
Text_Korean: 타락을 방해하는 자… 죽음을 받아들여라….

Name: Dialog_Act0205_Text4
Text_English: Death is fair to all…
Text_Korean: 죽음은 누구에게나 평등하지….

Name: Dialog_Act0205_Text5
Text_English: You cannot undo what's happened here…
Text_Korean: 넌 타락한 숲을 되돌릴 수 없다…

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text1
Text_English:
I'm worried about Rio.
She never stays put…
Text_Korean: 리오가 얌전히 있어야 할 텐데… 영 찜찜하단 말이야.

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text2
Text_English:
I can sense recklessness nearby... it must be Rio!
He’s close!
Text_Korean:
어머! 앞뒤 안 가리는 이 느낌, 분명 리오야!
가까이 있어.

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text3
Text_English: Rio!
Text_Korean: 리오!

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text4
Text_English: Give me a second, Nisse.
Text_Korean: 어! 니스 잠깐만!

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text5
Text_English: You, fool! It's dangerous!
Text_Korean: 바보야! 위험하다구!

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text6
Text_English: Aww… c'mon I was having fun!
Text_Korean: 하아, 재미없어…

Name: Dialog_Act0206_Text7
Text_English:
A human has defeated the ghost?
But why is the power of corruption still strong?
Text_Korean:
인간이 고스트를 물리쳤다고?!
그런데 왜 타락의 힘이 약해지지 않지?

Name: Dialog_Act0207_Text1
Text_English: I sense her presence! This way!
Text_Korean: 릴리스님이 가까이 계신 것 같아! 어서 가보자!

Name: Dialog_Act0207_Text2
Text_English: I can’t hold on any longer…Go!
Text_Korean: 이제 버틸 수가… 타락이 날 삼키기 전에… 떠나!

Name: Dialog_Act0207_Text3
Text_English: Sorry, we were too late…
Text_Korean: 늦어서 미안해….

Name: Dialog_Act0207_Text4
Text_English: Vines of the forest, please! We need to pass!
Text_Korean: 부탁이야. 길을 열어줘!

Name: Dialog_Act0207_Text5
Text_English:
Hurry, there's still time.
We cannot be late…
Text_Korean:
서두르자. 아직 늦지 않았을 거야.
아니, 늦지 않아야 해….

Name: Dialog_Act0208_Text1
Text_English:
There's something in the forest,
something I have never felt before….
Text_Korean: 어머! 숲 속에 뭔가 있어. 이런 힘은 처음 느껴보는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0208_Text2
Text_English: So it was true? I sense it as well… Let’s go!
Text_Korean: 정말이네? 뭔가 따뜻한 느낌이야… 일단 가보자!

Name: Dialog_Act0208_Text3
Text_English:
If you wish to meet the person you seek,
please hurry….
Text_Korean: 서두르세요. 만날 수 있을 거예요….

Name: Dialog_Act0208_Text4
Text_English:
Something was trying to help us.
It didn't feel evil.
Text_Korean:
뭔가 도우려는 느낌이었어.
악한 존재는 아닌 것 같은데….

Name: Dialog_Act0208_Text5
Text_English: So… who was she talking about?
Text_Korean: 그런데 누굴 만날 수 있다는 거야?

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text1
Text_English:
Ahhhh, this ambivalence. It must be Pan!
Let's find her.
Text_Korean:
그래… 흐리멍덩한 이 느낌, 팡의 기운이야!
찾아보자.

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text2
Text_English:
Where is she?
I can't believe I am doing this…
Text_Korean:
대체 이 녀석 어디 숨어 있는 거야?
가녀린 날 고생시키다니…

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text3
Text_English: Nisse! Rio!
Text_Korean: 니스! 리오!

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text4
Text_English: Hey! That hurts! You could have asked if you wanted a ride….
Text_Korean: 아이 아팡, 타고 싶으면 말로 하징… 히잉.

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text5
Text_English: Ugh… Let's just go.
Text_Korean: 하아… 일단 가자.

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text6
Text_English: Where are we going? Are we going to Lady Lilith?
Text_Korean:
우리 놀다 말고 어디 가는 거양?
릴리스 님께 가는 거양?

Name: Dialog_Act0209_Text7
Text_English:
I heard a voice like hers…
she said she’s going to kill us all!
Text_Korean:
아까 릴리스 님과 똑같은 목소리를 들었엉.
모두 죽인다고 했엉.

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text1
Text_English: Now that three of us have gathered, we can open the gate.
Text_Korean: 우리 셋이 모였으니 닫혀버린 요정의 문을 열 수 있어.

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text2
Text_English:
Poor Lady Lilith, this is for you!
I’m gonna to do my best to open the gate!
Text_Korean:
난 릴리스 님께 너무 미안하당.
요정의 문을 여는데, 온 힘을 다할 거당.

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text3
Text_English: We need to stop Lilith from breaking the seal.
Text_Korean: 릴리스 님이 봉인에서 벗어나는 걸 막아야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text4
Text_English: If we fail, we will never be able to cure Lilith.
Text_Korean: 막지 못하면 릴리스 님을 치유할 기회를 잃는 거야.

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text5
Text_English: Lilith!
Text_Korean: 릴리스 님!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text6
Text_English: Go away!
Text_Korean: 더러운 것들!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text7
Text_English: Come on in, I will show you death…
Text_Korean: 죽음을 맛 보여주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text8
Text_English: Rio! Pan! Open the portal!
Text_Korean: 리오! 팡! 문을 열자!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text9
Text_English: I’ll catch up later with Ramiel. You go first!
Text_Korean: 라미엘 님과 갈게. 먼저 가!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text10
Text_English: Take care of Lilith…
Text_Korean: 릴리스 님을 부탁해….

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text11
Text_English: This power… It’s been 100 years…!
Text_Korean: 이 해방감… 백 년만인가…!

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text12
Text_English: Remiel?
Text_Korean: 라미엘인가…?

Name: Dialog_Act0210_Text13
Text_English: I can rest now…
Text_Korean: 이제 쉴 수 있겠어….

Name: Dialog_Act0301_Text1
Text_English:
The Power of Grudgeis strong.
What is the High Priest of Death scheming?
Text_Korean:
원한의 기운이 자욱하잖소!
죽음의 사제는 뭘 꾸미는 거지?

Name: Dialog_Act0301_Text2
Text_English:
Wait- what? Something is getting in the way of my magic…
Be careful…
Text_Korean: 뭐지? 내 마법을 방해하는 힘이… 조심하시오….

Name: Dialog_Act0301_Text3
Text_English: Mortal… His sacrifice…
Text_Korean: 인간… 그분의… 제물이다….

Name: Dialog_Act0301_Text4
Text_English: We must… Break the seal…
Text_Korean: 우리는… 봉인을 풀어야 한다….

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text1
Text_English: I’m sensing a strange energy… be wary!
Text_Korean: 전과 다른 이상한 기운이 느껴지니 조심하시오.

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text2
Text_English: Wait, wait!
Text_Korean: 자, 잠깐!

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text3
Text_English: A little rude, don’t you think?
Text_Korean: 자, 잠깐! 초면에 실례잖아!

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text4
Text_English: You’re looking for the hooded men, right?
Text_Korean: 흠… 얼마 전에 온 후드 쓴 놈들 찾고 있지? 그렇지?

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text5
Text_English: You saw them?
Text_Korean: 네가 봤다고…?

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text6
Text_English: Heh heh, I’ll show you the way. Trust me!
Text_Korean: 흐흐, 내가 길을 알려 줄게. 가자고!

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text7
Text_English:
Ah! I forgot to warn you… this path is dangerous.
Sorry!
Text_Korean: 아! 적이 있다는 걸 안 알려줬군, 미안.

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text8
Text_English: Very good!  Now, this way!
Text_Korean: 좋아, 이쪽이야!

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text9
Text_English: We have to go through here.
Text_Korean: 여기를 지나야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0302_Text10
Text_English: Hey, don't die!
Text_Korean: 살아서 보자고!

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text1
Text_English: Very good! You're alive.
Text_Korean: 살아있었네.

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text2
Text_English: Shall we?
Text_Korean: 그럼 갈까?

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text3
Text_English:
The monsters… I think they’re trying to break the seal from
the deep within the tomb.
Text_Korean:
괴물들 말이야.
무덤 깊은 곳의 봉인을 풀려고 하는 것 같아.

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text4
Text_English: Heh heh, you’re keeping up well!
Text_Korean: 흐흥, 잘 따라오네.

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text5
Text_English: The tomb’s master!
Text_Korean: 이크! 무덤의 주인이로군.

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text6
Text_English: There you are! Kill that zombie!
Text_Korean: 여기 있었군. 저 좀비 놈을 없애라!

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text7
Text_English: I'll go first!
Text_Korean: 먼저 갈게!

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text8
Text_English: He wishes… Kill all humans…
Text_Korean: 그분의 명령… 인간 죽인다….

Name: Dialog_Act0303_Text9
Text_English: Sacrifice… You cannot run…
Text_Korean: 넌 제물… 못 도망친다…

Name: Dialog_Act0304_Text1
Text_English: Die by the claws of my underlings, human!
Text_Korean: 인간, 무시무시한 내 부하들의 손에 죽어라!

Name: Dialog_Act0304_Text2
Text_English: Ha! Nothing, don’t get cocky after only defeating my underlings.
Text_Korean:
조, 조금 하는구나.
허약한 내 부하들을 상대로 우쭐하지 마라.

Name: Dialog_Act0304_Text3
Text_English: Human, can't find the zombie?
Text_Korean: 그, 그래. 그 좀비 놈이 왜 안 보이는지 알고 있나?

Name: Dialog_Act0304_Text4
Text_English: You are a fool tricked by a zombie.
Text_Korean: 넌 속고 있다. 대가 없는 도움은 없는 법이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0304_Text5
Text_English: Hey, FRIEND! Help me!
Text_Korean: 친구 도와줘!

Name: Dialog_Act0305_Text1
Text_English: My FRIEND, please help!!
Text_Korean: 으으, 이봐 친구 도와줘!

Name: Dialog_Act0305_Text2
Text_English: Hey, will you hurry up?! Help!
Text_Korean: 이, 이봐 아직 멀었어? 이놈 강하다구!

Name: Dialog_Act0305_Text3
Text_English:
Don’t let the filthy human get in my way.
Predator, go!
Text_Korean:
저 인간 놈이 방해하지 못 하게 해라.
가라! 포식자여.

Name: Dialog_Act0305_Text4
Text_English: Master says… I can eat…
Text_Korean: 주인님이… 너 먹으라고 했다….

Name: Dialog_Act0305_Text5
Text_English: Human, you shall follow that zombie.
Text_Korean: 인간, 너도 좀비놈 뒤를 따르게 해주지.

Name: Dialog_Act0306_Text1
Text_English: Do you have a death wish, human?
Text_Korean: 인간, 한 켠에 묻히고 싶어서 돌아왔느냐?

Name: Dialog_Act0306_Text2
Text_English: You think missing one of my eyes will slow me down?
Text_Korean: 내 눈 하나 없앤 정도로 우쭐하지 마라.

Name: Dialog_Act0306_Text3
Text_English:
It's your fault. I should have gotten rid of you when
I had the chance.
Text_Korean:
너 때문이다! 좀비 놈을 없앴어야 했는데…
그놈을 없애야 해….

Name: Dialog_Act0306_Text4
Text_English:
If only I had the Blood Diamond…
This kind of seal is nothing…
Text_Korean:
블러드 다이아몬드만 있었다면…
넌 물론이고 이런 봉인쯤은….

Name: Dialog_Act0306_Text5
Text_English: I will kill that zombie and bury you next to him!
Text_Korean:
좀비 놈은 반드시 없앨 것이다!
그 옆에 네놈을 묻어주마.

Name: Dialog_Act0307_Text1
Text_English: What was that Power of Light the Zombie Warrior found?
Text_Korean: 좀비 전사가 찾아낸 빛의 구슬은 무엇이었을까?

Name: Dialog_Act0307_Text2
Text_English: Did you find the Zombie Warrior? Follow him.
Text_Korean: 그 좀비 전사를 발견했소? 그를 따라가시오.

Name: Dialog_Act0307_Text3
Text_English: There's more he must be hiding.
Text_Korean: 그에게는 뭔가 더 감춰져 있는 것 같으니 말이오.

Name: Dialog_Act0307_Text4
Text_English:
I am Miracle, the Oracle of the Soul Castle.
I will help Ramiel. Come to me.
Text_Korean:
저는 성녀 미라클. 라미엘 님을 돕겠습니다.
영혼의 성으로 오세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0307_Text5
Text_English: I know the way, very well, my friend.
Text_Korean: 그 길은 내가 잘 알지, 친구.

Name: Dialog_Act0308_Text1
Text_English:
Miracle? 
How… How did she appear from the Power of Light?
Text_Korean:
미라클인가? 무슨 관계야?
어떻게 빛의 구슬에서 나타난 건지 궁금하네.

Name: Dialog_Act0308_Text2
Text_English: My sword is being drawn to the Power of Light! My sword will lead the way.
Text_Korean:
아무튼, 내 검이 빛의 구슬과 반응하고 있어.
검이 이끄는 대로 가야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0308_Text3
Text_English:
Looks like you still have some fight in you,
but I won’t go down that easily.
Text_Korean:
흥, 네놈 힘이 좀 돌아왔나 보군.
하지만 이번엔 어림없다.

Name: Dialog_Act0308_Text4
Text_English:
Even if you managed to pass my underlings and traps,
you won’t get passed here!
Text_Korean:
내 강력한 부하들과 함정을 지나도
여기를 통과할 수 없다.

Name: Dialog_Act0308_Text5
Text_English: Do not worry. I just have to regain my memories, and it’ll be alright, my friend.
Text_Korean: 걱정 마, 내 남은 기억만 찾으면 해결될 거야. 친구.

Name: Dialog_Act0309_Text1
Text_English:
I can sense it! My sword is pulling me toward the Power of Light. 
Let’s follow the sword.
Text_Korean:
빛이 부르는 게 느껴져.
내 검이 인도하는 데로 따라가자.

Name: Dialog_Act0309_Text2
Text_English:
You cannot escape.
The time for revenge shall come.
Text_Korean:
열심히 뛰어 봤자 날 벗어날 수 없지.
복수의 때가 온다.

Name: Dialog_Act0309_Text3
Text_English: That ugly demon is far too noisy.
Text_Korean: 저 악마 놈은 말도 많고 눈도 많아.

Name: Dialog_Act0309_Text4
Text_English: I am Gregor… The one who sealed Beelzebub.
Text_Korean: 나는 그레고르… 대악마 벨제부브를 봉인한 자.

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text1
Text_English: You must defeat Beelzebub to pass through the tomb.
Text_Korean: 무덤을 통과하기 위해서는 벨제부브를 무찔러야 해.

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text2
Text_English:
Even though he’s sealed, he still controls this place. 
We must silence him at once.
Text_Korean:
봉인된 상태에서도 이곳을 지배하고 있어서
그 힘을 없애야 하거든.

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text3
Text_English: I am going to break the seal, but you’ll still need to fight him….
Text_Korean: 난 봉인을 풀 힘을 모을 테니 전투를 부탁해, 친구.

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text4
Text_English: Ramiel isn’t well… Could Miracle really help her…?
Text_Korean:
라미엘 님의 상태가 안 좋더군.
정말 미라클이 도울 수 있는 걸까?

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text5
Text_English:
We must send her to Soul Castle.
Damn Beelzebub… We’re losing precious time here!
Text_Korean:
아무튼, 영혼의 성으로 꼭 보내 드려야 해.
벨제부브놈 성가시게 하다니!

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text7
Text_English:
An irony…
I must undo the seal that I’ve bestowed….
Text_Korean:
운명의 장난 같군.
내가 만든 봉인을 내 손으로 열어야 한다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text8
Text_English: You’ll need to take it from here, my friend.
Text_Korean: 뒤를 부탁하네, 친구….

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text9
Text_English: The Blood Diamond…
Text_Korean: 블러드 다이아몬드…

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text10
Text_English: How dare you!
Text_Korean: 감히 네놈이!

Name: Dialog_Act0310_Text11
Text_English: Time to release the hatred!
Text_Korean: 갇혀 있던 원한을 풀 시간이다!

Name: Dialog_Act0401_Text1
Text_English:
This was a sacred place…
It was supposed to protect the souls…
Text_Korean:
세계에서 모이는 영혼들을 지키고 정화시키는
성역에 이런 일이….

Name: Dialog_Act0401_Text2
Text_English: I wonder if Miracle is in danger as well?
Text_Korean: 미라클 님도 위험에 빠지신 게 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0401_Text3
Text_English:
The spirits are screaming…
Something's wrong.
Text_Korean:
영혼들의 비명 소리가 들려요. 위급한 것 같은데…
뭔가 심상치 않아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0401_Text4
Text_English: Do you know how to do this?
Text_Korean: 이런 거 할 줄 알아?

Name: Dialog_Act0401_Text5
Text_English: Well, well, well.
Text_Korean: 나보다 뛰어나다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text1
Text_English: The spirits are dwindling. What happened?
Text_Korean: 영혼들의 수가 줄어들고 있어요. 어떻게 된 일이지?

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text2
Text_English:
The goblin magician is reaping the spirits…
What's going on?
Text_Korean:
고블린 술사가 영혼들을 잡아들이다니…
무슨 일을 꾸미는 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text3
Text_English: The spirits are calling us.
Text_Korean: 어! 어떤 영혼이 우리를 부르고 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text4
Text_English: I’m Bertha, an Oracle that was sent by Miracle.
Text_Korean: 성녀 베르타입니다. 미라클님이 보내셨어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text5
Text_English: I will explain on our way.
Text_Korean: 일단 가면서 말씀드리지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0402_Text6
Text_English: I served closely with Miracle and I’m here to help you.
Text_Korean:
전 미라클 님을 가까이 모시던 성녀입니다.
제가 여러분을 돕겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text1
Text_English: I hear souls screaming. It must be the Goblin Shaman.
Text_Korean: 영혼들의 비명이 들려요. 고블린 술사가 틀림없어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text2
Text_English: Who dares to interrupt the hunt?
Text_Korean: 넌 누군데 사냥을 방해하는 거야?

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text3
Text_English: We cannot lose it. I will chase it down.
Text_Korean: 놓치면 안 돼요. 제가 쫓아가겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text4
Text_English:
I lost it… It has left this place,
but I am sure it will search for souls elsewhere.
Text_Korean:
놓쳤어요. 이곳을 떠난 것 같아요.
다른 곳의 영혼들을 노릴 거예요.

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text5
Text_English:
Miracle has always suffered because of her powers.
It’s so sad…
Text_Korean:
미라클님은 그 힘 때문에 소녀 때부터
고난이 끊이지 않았어요. 안타깝게도….

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text6
Text_English: Intruder! I shall teach you a lesson!
Text_Korean: 방해자 놈! 내 실력을 보여주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0403_Text7
Text_English: Faster than my arrow…
Text_Korean: 내 화살보다 빠르다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text1
Text_English: Their attacks are becoming more fierce. I will look for the Goblin Shaman.
Text_Korean: 공격이 거세군요. 제가 고블린 술사를 찾겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text2
Text_English: I can hear Bertha's scream. She must be in danger!
Text_Korean: 베르타 님의 비명소리가 들려요. 위험한 것 같아요!

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text3
Text_English: H-help me!
Text_Korean: 도, 도와주세요!

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text4
Text_English: No! My hard work…
Text_Korean: 안돼! 내가 힘들게 모은 영혼들이….

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text5
Text_English: So close…
Text_Korean: 의식이 멀지 않았는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text6
Text_English:
Thank you so much, hero.
All the freed souls give their thanks as well.
Text_Korean: 정말 감사드려요. 풀려난 영혼들도 감사하고 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0404_Text7
Text_English:
They’ve informed me that there are more souls imprisoned
in the Butcher’s room.
Text_Korean:
그들이 도살자의 방에 영혼들이 잡혀 있다고
알려 주었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0405_Text1
Text_English:
The Goblin Shaman just went past here!
We must stop it.
Text_Korean: 고블린 술사가 지나갔어요! 그를 막아야 해요.

Name: Dialog_Act0405_Text2
Text_English:
I can sense many souls,
but I cannot tell where they are.
Text_Korean:
많은 영혼이 느껴져요.
그런데 어디 있는지 모르겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0405_Text3
Text_English: I wonder where the Butcher could be hiding them…
Text_Korean: 도살자는 어디에 영혼들을 가둬 놓은 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0405_Text4
Text_English: Sacrifice everything!
Text_Korean: 모든 것을 바쳐라!

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text1
Text_English:
Oh no… We must prepare ourselves.
It looks like their ritual was successful.
Text_Korean:
이런… 새로운 위기를 각오해야 할 것 같습니다.
의식이 성공한 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text2
Text_English:
It feels like the air is being torn apart.
Looks like a powerful demon has awakened.
Text_Korean:
공기가 짓눌리는 위압감이 느껴집니다.
강력한 악마가 눈을 뜬 것 같군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text3
Text_English: Bertha! Find the Memory Fragment!
Text_Korean: 베르타! 기억의 파편을 찾으세요!

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text4
Text_English: No! Miracle!
Text_Korean: 안돼! 미라클님!

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text5
Text_English:
That is Vulcanus, a terrifying demon.
To think it was holding Miracle hostage.
Text_Korean:
불카누스라는 공포의 존재예요.
저 악마가 미라클님을 인질로 삼다니….

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text6
Text_English:
But, Vulcanus died a hundred years ago…
And this Vulcanus felt different.
Text_Korean:
하지만 그는 백 년 전에 죽었어요.
그리고 불카누스가 아닌 것 같은 느낌을 받았어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text7
Text_English: I… shall devour your soul.
Text_Korean: 너… 영혼까지 먹는다.

Name: Dialog_Act0406_Text8
Text_English: I will not let go…
Text_Korean: 난 놓치지 않아….

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text1
Text_English:
Miracle spent her entire life in the castle,
but never once neglected her responsibilities.
I must save her.
Text_Korean:
미라클 님은 평생 성에서 살아야 했지만 원망 없이
사명에 충실했어요. 그분을 꼭 구해드리고 싶어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text2
Text_English:
I could feel Miracle’s power.
A Memory Fragment is close by.
Text_Korean: 미라클 님의 힘이 느껴집니다. 가까이 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text3
Text_English: There is a Memory Fragment here.
Text_Korean: 여기에 기억의 파편이 있습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text4
Text_English:
I am at the top floor.
Be wary of the soul within Vulcanus' body.
Text_Korean:
저는 최상층에 있어요.
불카누스에 담긴 빛의 영혼을 조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text5
Text_English: Soul of light…? Let’s head to the top floor now.
Text_Korean: 빛의 영혼…? 일단 최상층으로 가시죠.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text6
Text_English: So Vulcanus was able to move because of another soul.
Text_Korean:
불카누스가 움직일 수 있었던 건 다른 영혼이 있기
때문이었군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text7
Text_English: I wonder who that soul of light was?
Text_Korean: 빛의 영혼은 대체 누구일까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0407_Text8
Text_English: Did you expect that I would run all the time?
Text_Korean: 언제까지 도망만 칠 줄 알았느냐!

Name: Dialog_Act0408_Text1
Text_English: The strange disharmony I sensed was because of the soul of light.
Text_Korean:
불카누스를 목격했을 때 받은 이질적인 느낌은
빛의 영혼 때문이었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0408_Text2
Text_English: How did that soul of light get a hold of Vulcanus’s body?
Text_Korean:
대체 빛의 영혼은 불카누스의 육체를 어떻게
차지했을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0408_Text3
Text_English:
If it was the soul of light, it must be a holy being.
Could it be an angel’s soul…?
Text_Korean:
빛의 영혼이라면 성스러운 존재인 것 같은데
설마 천사의 영혼…?

Name: Dialog_Act0408_Text4
Text_English:
I know it’s hard to believe,
but the power from that soul reminded me of an angel.
Text_Korean:
믿기 어렵지만, 그 영혼의 힘은 천사에 가까웠던 것
같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0408_Text5
Text_English:
What could the purpose of that soul be?
We must heed Miracle’s warning.
Text_Korean:
그 영혼의 목적이 위험한 걸까요?
미라클 님의 말씀대로 조심해야 해요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text1
Text_English:
Something is odd…
It feels like something strange is watching us.
Text_Korean:
뭔가 이상해요. 이질적인 힘이 우리를 감시하는 것
같은 기분이 들어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text2
Text_English:
Something is still watching us,
but we’ll be at the top soon. Hang on just a bit longer.
Text_Korean:
감시의 눈길이 사라지지 않는군요.
하지만 곧 최상층입니다. 힘내세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text3
Text_English:
Oh my, Miracle must have left another Memory Fragment.
I can sense it.
Text_Korean:
어머, 미라클 님께서 남겨 놓은 기억의 파편이
또 있나 봐요. 힘이 느껴져요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text4
Text_English: If you see this memory fragment…  I will have been taken to the Sky Castle.
Text_Korean: 이 기억을 읽었을 때 즈음 전 천공성에 끌려갔을 거예요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text5
Text_English: Please, no….
Text_Korean: 오, 안돼….

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text6
Text_English: Bertha, my only true friend. I thank you
Text_Korean: 베르타 내 유일한 친구, 고마웠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text7
Text_English: This… is far as I go. Please rescue Miracle….
Text_Korean: 전… 여기까지군요. 미라클 님을 부탁….

Name: Dialog_Act0409_Text8
Text_English: Tell Ramiel… That Azrael is waiting….
Text_Korean: 전해라, 라미엘에게. 아즈라엘이 기다린다고….

Name: Dialog_Act0410_Text1
Text_English: Why did you summon Azrael! Why!? WHY!?
Text_Korean: 고위 죽음의 사제… 아즈라엘을 불러 내다니… 대체 왜?!

Name: Dialog_Act0410_Text2
Text_English: It’s me Azrael wants. I’ll go alone.
Text_Korean: 아즈라엘이 원하는 건 저예요. 먼저 가겠어요!

Name: Dialog_Act0410_Text3
Text_English: Come, Ramiel. This time, it is you who will burn in hell.
Text_Korean: 어서 오라, 라미엘… 이제는 네가 지옥에 갈 차례다.

Name: Dialog_Act0410_Text4
Text_English: Ramiel, I’ll be waiting in hell…
Text_Korean: 라미엘, 지옥에서 기다리겠다….

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text1
Text_English: Nidhogg ruled the surrounding lands with an iron fist.
Text_Korean:
성의 주인 니드호그의 힘 때문에 천공성은
공포의 상징이었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text2
Text_English:
A hundred years ago during the war,
we lost an angel in Nifelheim.
Text_Korean: 백 년 전 전쟁 때 우리는 천공성에서 한 천사를 잃었지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text3
Text_English: No one could defeat Nidhogg back then.
Text_Korean: 백 년 전 누구도 니드호그를 쓰러뜨리지 못했어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text4
Text_English: The High Priests of Death couldn’t even compare to Nighogg's power.
Text_Korean:
그런 니드호그가 고위 죽음의 사제를 돕는 이유를
알 수 없군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text5
Text_English: I follow the money!
Text_Korean: 돈만 주면 어디든지 간다!

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text6
Text_English: Where's my pay?
Text_Korean: 아직 다 못 받았는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0501_Text7
Text_English: Daniel…?!
Text_Korean: 다니엘…?!

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text1
Text_English: How can a soul be this beautiful…
Text_Korean: 영혼마저 이렇게 아름다울 수가….

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text2
Text_English:
Vivian was a strong and beautiful hero,
but she’s being controlled by darkness.
Text_Korean:
비비안은 아름답고도 강한 영웅이었는데
어둠에 조종당하고 있군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text3
Text_English: We must free her soul and put her to rest.
Text_Korean:
조종당하는 그녀에게 필요한 건 안식일 거예요.
그렇지 않을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text4
Text_English: I will lead you to your death!
Text_Korean: 원하시니 죽음으로 인도해 드리지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text5
Text_English: Please free the others like me…
Text_Korean: 제 동료들을 부탁드려요.

Name: Dialog_Act0502_Text6
Text_English: May you finally have eternal peace…
Text_Korean: 이제는 영원한 안식을….

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text1
Text_English: You should’ve seen how great I was 100 years ago….
Text_Korean: 백 년 전 이곳에서 제 활약을 보셨어야 했는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text2
Text_English: I may look like this now, but I was once one of the four lieutenants of Ramiel, the Archangel.
Text_Korean:
이래 봬도 라미엘 님을 보좌하는 네 명의 천사 중
하나에요.

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text3
Text_English: Sigh… I miss those times I spent with Azreal and Lilith.
Text_Korean: 아즈라엘, 릴리스와 함께했던 때가 그립네요.

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text4
Text_English: Where are the other souls that Vivian spoke of?
Text_Korean: 비비안이 말한 다른 영혼들은 어디에 있을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text5
Text_English: How could they not leave any trace?
Text_Korean: 어쩜 이렇게 흔적 하나 남기지 않았을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text6
Text_English: I shall strike your heart!
Text_Korean: 네 심장을 맞춰주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0503_Text7
Text_English: Missed! Unacceptable!
Text_Korean: 못 맞췄어! 아이고 분해!

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text1
Text_English: This is the path to the center of the Heavenly Castle.
Text_Korean: 여기가 천공성 중앙으로 가는 길입니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text2
Text_English: Watch out for demons. I will watch from the sky.
Text_Korean:
악마들을 조심하세요.
저는 하늘에서 지켜보겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text3
Text_English: Damn, I should've had your head… hahahah!
Text_Korean: 아이참, 머리를 가져갈 수 있었는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text4
Text_English: I’m fine. Haha. Let’s go after her.
Text_Korean: 저는 괜찮아요, 하하. 어서 쫓아가죠.

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text5
Text_English: Aveline is an assassin as deadly as she is beautiful.
Text_Korean: 아벨린은 그 미모만큼 뛰어난 암살자였어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text6
Text_English:
The demons who died by her hands were happy,
but they probably didn’t even realize what was happening.
Text_Korean:
그녀의 손에 죽은 악마들은 행복했겠지만
대부분 자신도 모르는 사이에 당했지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text7
Text_English: I’ll gladly remove your head!
Text_Korean: 머리를 바치고 싶다면 받아주지!

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text8
Text_English: To be controlled by a creature like Bereth… Please avenge…
Text_Korean: 베레스 따위에게 이용당하다니, 복수를 부탁….

Name: Dialog_Act0504_Text9
Text_English: Come amuse me, haha!
Text_Korean: 와라! 새로운 장난감들아. 으하하하!

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text1
Text_English:
Bereth is hiding somewhere.
Be careful.
Text_Korean:
베레스가 모습을 감추고 있는 것 같습니다.
조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text2
Text_English: I revel in death as much as you. Hahaha!
Text_Korean: 경쾌하지 않나? 악마들의 비명 소리가… 크크크.

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text3
Text_English:
How did it feel when you killed my demons?
You’re no different from me! Hahahaha
Text_Korean:
내 영혼들을 죽일 때 기분이 어땠지?
넌 나와 다르지 않아. 흐흐흐.

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text4
Text_English: Embrace the darkness.
Text_Korean: 타락의 속박을 안겨주마.

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text5
Text_English: Let’s end this.
Text_Korean: 학살의 마무리를 지어볼까?

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text6
Text_English: Remiel!
Text_Korean: 라미엘!

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text7
Text_English: Shut up!
Text_Korean: 닥쳐!

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text8
Text_English: Silence! Never utter my name with your foul breath!
Text_Korean: 그 썩은 입으로 내 이름을 말하지 마!

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text9
Text_English: Die! Die! DIEEEE!!
Text_Korean: 죽어! 죽어! 죽어!

Name: Dialog_Act0505_Text10
Text_English: Wh… who are you?! KAHHH!
Text_Korean: 너, 넌 누구냐?! 크아악!

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text1
Text_English:
I’m worried about her condition.
We need to help her now!
Text_Korean:
라미엘 님의 상태가 걱정입니다.
빨리 도와드려야 하는데….

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text2
Text_English: If Bereth is dead, then the corrupted souls must have been released.
Text_Korean: 잠깐, 베레스가 죽었다면 영혼들의 타락이 풀렸겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text3
Text_English: I will search for the other souls and request for help.
Text_Korean: 제가 다른 영혼을 찾아 도움을 청하겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text4
Text_English: You. Come to me. I’ll be waiting!
Text_Korean: 네가 직접 와라! 기다리겠다!

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text5
Text_English: Is he gone?
Text_Korean: 갔나요?

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text6
Text_English: Whew… Thought that’d be the last of me.
Text_Korean: 휴, 정말 죽는 줄 알았어요. 이, 이쪽입니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text7
Text_English: Let me kill you myself!
Text_Korean: 넌 특별히 이 손으로 죽여주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0506_Text8
Text_English: Fail…
Text_Korean: 암살 실패….

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text1
Text_English: Jean still enjoys fighting strong opponents.
Text_Korean: 진은 여전히 강한 자와 겨루는 걸 좋아하네요.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text2
Text_English: He joined us just so he could fight more powerful demons.
Text_Korean: 그는 강한 악마들과 겨루기 위해 우리와 함께 했어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text3
Text_English: Now, it seems like the only one he’s looking at is you.
Text_Korean: 이제 그의 눈에는 당신밖에 보이지 않는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text4
Text_English: Follow me if you dare!
Text_Korean: 용기가 있다면 나를 따라와라!

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text5
Text_English: He used to wreak havoc here and there when he was in Elisium too.
Text_Korean: 엘리시움에 있을 때도 여기저기를 부숴 댔어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text6
Text_English: Uhg… I shudder every time I see him.
Text_Korean: 그가 보입니다. 으, 벌써부터 몸이 떨리는데요.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text7
Text_English: Let our weapons do the talking!
Text_Korean: 이제 힘의 대화를 시작해 볼까?

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text8
Text_English: Where is the Oracle?
Text_Korean: 혹시 성녀를 보셨습니까?

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text9
Text_English: The Oracle who summoned me?
Text_Korean: 날 불러낸 성녀를 말하는 건가?

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text10
Text_English: Go ask Zeke.
Text_Korean: 지크를 찾아가라.

Name: Dialog_Act0507_Text11
Text_English: May you have eternal rest…
Text_Korean: 영원한 안식을….

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text1
Text_English: Zeke was a responsible, yet powerful drill master.
Text_Korean: 지크는 책임감이 강한 교관이었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text2
Text_English: He will hear my words. I will go request for his help.
Text_Korean: 그라면 말이 통할 거예요. 제가 도움을 청하겠습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text3
Text_English: Ack! Please help!
Text_Korean: 아앗! 도와주세요!

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text4
Text_English: I faced a Gargoyle after finding Zeke, so….
Text_Korean: 지크를 찾아냈는데 가고일과 마주쳐서 그만….

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text5
Text_English: Ah… If my wings weren’t so cramped… I swear!
Text_Korean: 아오, 날개에 쥐만 안 났어도… 지, 진짜예요.

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text6
Text_English: I am a master in faking death!
Text_Korean: 죽은 척이 내 특기다!

Name: Dialog_Act0508_Text7
Text_English: It's time for my specialty…
Text_Korean: 내 특기를 쓸 때군….

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text1
Text_English:
The soul of the Gladiator, Zeke, is in front of you.
Get ready!
Text_Korean:
전방에 검투사 지크의 영혼 출현입니다.
준비하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text2
Text_English: If you train your senses, you can react to battles you didn’t expect.
Text_Korean: 감각을 익히면 예상치 못한 전투도 대응할 수 있네.

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text3
Text_English: If you can’t beat me, you have no chance against Nidhogg!
Text_Korean: 나를 넘지 못하면 니드호그도 이길 수 없네!

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text4
Text_English: This is your final lesson.
Text_Korean: 마지막 가르침을 시작해볼까?

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text5
Text_English: Look for the Oracle at the resting place of Nidhogg….
Text_Korean:
성녀를 찾고 있겠지?
가라. 니드호그의 안식처로….

Name: Dialog_Act0509_Text6
Text_English: I wish you peace…
Text_Korean: 영원한 안식을….

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text1
Text_English: What a chilling area… This must be where Nidhogg resides.
Text_Korean: 오싹한 게 니드호그의 영역에 들어선 것 같군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text2
Text_English: It would be a nightmare if Nidhogg attacked us right now.
Text_Korean: 니드호그가 세계를 공격한다면 악몽이 시작될 겁니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text3
Text_English:
This darkness… I can sense him.
He’s here.
Text_Korean: 제 안의 어둠이 요동치는 이 느낌… 그 자가 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text4
Text_English:
Does Nidhogg want the power
of the Blood Diamond as well?
Text_Korean:
설마 니드호그도 블러드 다이아몬드의 힘을
원하는 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text5
Text_English: Feel the power of my curse!
Text_Korean: 저주로 얻은 힘을 느껴보아라!

Name: Dialog_Act0510_Text6
Text_English: You are just a prey…
Text_Korean: 넌 먹이가 될 뿐이다….

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text1
Text_English: Was I dreaming? This place is identical to what Miracle had described.
Text_Korean:
미라클은 꿈이었을까?
하지만 이곳을 보면 그녀의 말과 일치하는 것 같아.

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text2
Text_English: A world consumed by darkness with demons more powerful than before.
Text_Korean:
과연 어둠이 뿌리내린 세계로군.
악마들의 공격이 강력해.

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text3
Text_English: What did Miracle mean by "the source of darkness moves"
Text_Korean: 어둠의 근원이 움직인다는 것은 어떤 의미지?

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text4
Text_English: So… You are the one who fights the darkness.
Text_Korean: 어둠과 싸우는 분이시군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text5
Text_English: Daniel!
Text_Korean: 다니엘!

Name: Dialog_Act0601_Text6
Text_English: Do you… know me…?
Text_Korean: 저를… 아십니까…?

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text1
Text_English: I am worried about Ramiel. I can barely feel the power of light within her….
Text_Korean:
라미엘 님의 안위가 걱정이네요.
빛의 힘이 희미하게 느껴지다니…

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text2
Text_English: It's been a while, Daniel.
Text_Korean: 오랜만이군. 다니엘.

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text3
Text_English: I'll take it from here sister.
Text_Korean: 어머 얘는, 오늘은 인사만 하러 온 거잖아.

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text4
Text_English: Hi, I've got a gift for you!
Text_Korean: 멋진 선물을 기대해.

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text5
Text_English: I fought those demons during the war. They can steal your memories.
Text_Korean:
저 악마들은 전쟁 때 저와 겨뤘던 자들입니다.
기억을 빼앗는 능력이 있어요

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text6
Text_English: Beware, when they take your memories, they erase them from your mind.
Text_Korean: 빼앗긴 기억은 당신의 머리 속에서 지워지니 조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text7
Text_English: How did we meet? How do you remember me?
Text_Korean:
그런데 우리는 어떻게 만났었나요?
당신이 저를 어떻게 기억하는지 궁금하네요.

Name: Dialog_Act0602_Text8
Text_English: Perhaps you know Miracle as well?
Text_Korean: 그렇다면 혹시 미라클 님도 알고 계신건가요?

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text1
Text_English: It seems they took my memories of you.
Text_Korean:
어쩌면 저는 그들에게 당신에 대한 기억을
빼앗겼는지도 모르겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text2
Text_English: A dark presence is hiding. I should take a look. Be careful.
Text_Korean:
어둠의 기운이 숨어 있군요. 살펴봐야겠습니다.
조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text3
Text_English: My my, calm down.
Text_Korean: 어머 진정해.

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text4
Text_English: You're in for a surprise the next time we meet.
Text_Korean: 다시 만날 때 깜짝 놀라게 될 거야.

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text5
Text_English: No! That demon must have stolen your memory.
Text_Korean: 이런! 저 악마가 당신의 기억을 훔친 게 분명합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0603_Text6
Text_English: How much did she take? This can’t be…
Text_Korean: 어디까지 빼앗긴 거지? 큰일이군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0604_Text1
Text_English:
Janne and Darc have the power to materialize
any creature from your memories.
Text_Korean:
잔느와 다르크는 훔친 기억 속의 어떤 존재건
실체화시킬 수 있습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0604_Text2
Text_English: Whether it be allies or monsters, of course.
Text_Korean: 그것이 아군은 물론이고 악마라도 말이지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0604_Text3
Text_English:
That reminds me, there was a demon
that Janne and Darc worked for.
Text_Korean: 그러고 보니 잔느와 다르크가 따르던 악마가 떠오르네요.

Name: Dialog_Act0604_Text4
Text_English: He vowed to become the Absolute Darkness and take revenge.
Text_Korean:
그는 자신이 절대 어둠이 되어 복수하겠다고
부르짖었었지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text1
Text_English: Something isn't right. This may be your chance to get your memories back!
Text_Korean:
심상치 않은 분위기군요.
당신의 기억을 찾을 기회가 있을지도 모르겠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text2
Text_English:
The power of darkness may lie dormant nearby.
Be careful.
Text_Korean:
강력한 어둠의 힘이 잠들어 있는 것 같습니다.
조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text3
Text_English: Recognize this, Daniel? It was taken from your memories.
Text_Korean: 다니엘, 너의 기억으로 만든 악마 병기야.

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text4
Text_English: What is that?
Text_Korean: 저, 저건 뭐지?!

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text5
Text_English: Daniel!
Text_Korean: 다니엘!

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text6
Text_English: Enjoy yourself.
Text_Korean: 그럼 놀아볼까!

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text7
Text_English: Kneel before my power!
Text_Korean: 내 힘을 보여주마!

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text8
Text_English: Apocalypse will deal with you….
Text_Korean: 어차피 네놈들은 아포칼립스 님에게….

Name: Dialog_Act0605_Text9
Text_English: My memories have returned. It seems I was used as well….
Text_Korean: 당신이 기억납니다. 저도 이용당했군요….

Name: Dialog_Act0606_Text1
Text_English: Your memories hold heroic friends, but powerful enemies as well.
Text_Korean:
당신의 기억 속에는 강한 적들과 훌륭한 친구들이
존재하고 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0606_Text2
Text_English: If your memories were to materialize, the coming battles will be fierce.
Text_Korean:
그런 자들이 실체화되어 나타난다면 버거운 전투가
될지도 모르겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0606_Text3
Text_English: I wonder if the High Priest of Death is a minion of Apocalypse.
Text_Korean:
어쩌면 고위 죽음의 사제가 아포칼립스의
부하일 수도 있겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0606_Text4
Text_English: So tell me, how did you meet Miracle?
Text_Korean: 그런데 그대는 미라클 님을 어떻게 알게 되었나요?

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text1
Text_English: Janne has been very quiet… There is no reason for her to keep her distance.
Text_Korean:
잔느가 움직이지 않는 게 찜찜하군요.
가만히 있을 리 없는데…

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text2
Text_English: You'll pay for what you've done to Darc!
Text_Korean: 네놈들이 감히 다르크를!

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text3
Text_English: Pain and suffering will come your way!
Text_Korean: 기대해. 괴로움에 몸부림치게 해줄 테니.

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text4
Text_English: I am worried which of your memories Janne will wield against us.
Text_Korean: 잔느가 당신의 어떤 기억을 이용할지 불안하군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text5
Text_English: Ramiel is still alive. I can still feel a faint trace of the power of light.
Text_Korean:
희미한 빛의 힘이 느껴지는 것으로 보아
라미엘 님은 살아 계신 것 같습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0607_Text6
Text_English: I just hope Miracle is okay as well.
Text_Korean: 부디 미라클 님도 무사하셨으면 좋겠군요.

Name: Dialog_Act0608_Text1
Text_English: The war drove us all mad, cruelty became our goal.
Text_Korean:
전쟁의 광기에 휩싸인 천사와 악마들은 경쟁하듯
잔인한 살육을 벌였어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0608_Text2
Text_English: The goodness of angels disapeared. Such are the horrors of war….
Text_Korean:
그것이 전쟁의 무서운 점이지만 천사들의 모습에서
절대 선을 찾기 어려웠지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0608_Text3
Text_English: As a half-blood, I faced much discrimination for my smaller wings and frame.
Text_Korean:
혼혈인 저는 작은 날개와 체구 때문에
극심한 차별과 고통을 겪었습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0608_Text4
Text_English: I gave up everything to escape that pain in order to make it to where I am now.
Text_Korean:
저는 고통에서 벗어나기 위해 죽을 힘으로 노력했고
지금의 자리에 올라왔지요.

Name: Dialog_Act0608_Text5
Text_English: I almost envy the Demons, they didn't discriminate against their own.
Text_Korean: 차라리 차별없이 본능에 충실한 악마들이 부럽기도 했습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text1
Text_English: I feel a powerful, dark energy nearby. Be careful.
Text_Korean: 강력한 어둠의 힘이 숨어 있는 것 같아요. 조심하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text2
Text_English: Wait, what is that? It feels... Familiar. Be careful, Hero.
Text_Korean:
뭐지? 어둠의 힘이 아닌 낯익은 기운이….
아무튼 방심하지 마세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text3
Text_English: Ah, a friendly reunion.
Text_Korean: 네 친구야. 어차피 기억 못 할 테지만…

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text4
Text_English: Remember him?
Text_Korean: 어차피 기억 못 할 테지만…

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text5
Text_English: That sword…is that you Gregor?
Text_Korean: 아니! 저 자가 든 검은…!

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text6
Text_English: Cunning fool….
Text_Korean: 교활한 놈….

Name: Dialog_Act0609_Text7
Text_English: So, she had some of your memories as well, Daniel.
Text_Korean: 너도 빼앗긴 기억이 있었나 보군.

Name: Dialog_Act0610_Text1
Text_English: Something is wrong. The faint power of light has disappeared. You must hurry!
Text_Korean:
무슨 일이 생긴 것 같습니다.
희미한 빛의 기운이 사라졌어요. 서두릅시다.

Name: Dialog_Act0610_Text2
Text_English: Now I have become the true Absolute Darkness….
Text_Korean: 이제 내가 진정한 절대 어둠이다….

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text1
Text_English:
Absolute Darkness is moving fast.
Elisium is already corrupted by its evil power.
Text_Korean:
절대 어둠의 움직임이 빠르군요.
이미 엘리시움은 사악한 힘에 오염되었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text2
Text_English:
These seeds overflow with evil energy.
I may be able to purify them, but there are so many.
Text_Korean:
이 포자들이 사악한 힘을 뿜어내고 있어요.
제가 정화할 수 있을 것 같지만 너무 많네요.

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text3
Text_English:
Such cruelty.
I hope others who assisted you stay safe….
Text_Korean: 참혹하군요. 부디 그대를 돕던 다른 분들이 무사하기를….

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text4
Text_English: He is still alive.
Text_Korean: 아직 살아 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text5
Text_English: Thank you. I’m Brutus, Daniel’s lieutenant.
Text_Korean: 고맙다. 나는 다니엘 님의 부관 브루투스다.

Name: Dialog_Act0701_Text6
Text_English: You're Daniel's lieutenant…?
Text_Korean: 다니엘의 부관이라고…?

Name: Dialog_Act0702_Text1
Text_English: Those currupted angels were my comrades from Daniel’s unit.
Text_Korean: 세뇌 당한 천사들은 다니엘 부대에 있던 내 동료들이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0702_Text2
Text_English: Death to demons, protect Ramiel!
Text_Korean: 라미엘 님을 해치려는 악마들에게 죽음을!

Name: Dialog_Act0702_Text3
Text_English: Daniel protected us and fought against demons with his might. Why would he do this…?
Text_Korean:
다니엘 님은 강한 힘으로 우리를 지키고 악마와 싸웠다.
그런데 왜 이런 일을…?

Name: Dialog_Act0702_Text4
Text_English:
Did Daniel make a this decision because of how poorly he was treated?
I didn't realize he was hurt so badly….
Text_Korean:
설마 다니엘 님은 자신의 상처 때문에 그릇된 선택을
한 것인가? 그토록 상처가 깊을 줄은….

Name: Dialog_Act0702_Text5
Text_English:
What a tragedy…
What good am I if I can’t restore my comrades….
Text_Korean:
이런 비극이… 동료들을 되돌리지 못하는 내 자신이
너무 무력하구나….

Name: Dialog_Act0703_Text1
Text_English: Absolute Darkness used the Seeds of Death to remove the light and corrupt the sacred grounds.
Text_Korean:
죽음의 포자는 절대 어둠이 성역의 빛을 오염시킬 때
사용해왔다.

Name: Dialog_Act0703_Text2
Text_English: Seeds of Death release evil energy that strengthens demons.
Text_Korean: 죽음의 포자는 사악한 힘을 뿜어내어 악마들을 강하게 만든다.

Name: Dialog_Act0703_Text3
Text_English: The stronger the power of darkness, the faster it spreads.
Text_Korean: 그리고 어둠의 힘이 강력해지면 빠르게 늘어나지.

Name: Dialog_Act0703_Text4
Text_English: Many of these spores will disappear once Absolute Darkness is defeated.
Text_Korean:
이 수많은 포자들도 절대 어둠을 쓰러뜨린다면
사라질 것이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0704_Text1
Text_English: I sense Daniel’s energy. I will find him.
Text_Korean: 다니엘 님의 기운이 느껴진다. 내가 찾아내겠다.

Name: Dialog_Act0704_Text2
Text_English: You don’t have long, Brutus….
Text_Korean: 얼마 남지 않았구나. 부르투스….

Name: Dialog_Act0704_Text3
Text_English: Daniel stop!
Text_Korean: 제발 멈추십시오!

Name: Dialog_Act0704_Text4
Text_English: It belive Daniel went to the central assemble hall…. It was his place of rest….
Text_Korean:
다니엘 님은 중앙 집회소로 간 것 같다….
자신의 안식처였지….

Name: Dialog_Act0704_Text5
Text_English: Daniel must be stopped… Let’s break through here.
Text_Korean: 반드시 다니엘 님을 멈춰야 한다…. 이곳을 돌파하자.

Name: Dialog_Act0705_Text1
Text_English:
There isn’t much time.
Champion of Light, you must stop Daniel!
Text_Korean:
시간이 얼마 남지 않았다. 꼭 다니엘 님을 막아다오.
빛의 인도자여!

Name: Dialog_Act0705_Text2
Text_English:
So you have come… But you cannot stop me.
Watch as I create the brand new world!
Text_Korean:
결국 쫓아왔군… 너희는 날 막을 수 없다.
내가 만들어 내는 새로운 세상을 지켜보아라!

Name: Dialog_Act0705_Text3
Text_English: Be the sacrifice of a new beginning!
Text_Korean: 새로운 시작의 제물이 되어라!

Name: Dialog_Act0705_Text4
Text_English: Witness the power bestowed onto me!
Text_Korean: 그 분께 부여 받은 내 힘을 보아라!

Name: Dialog_Act0705_Text5
Text_English: Let’s meet again in a world free of pain….
Text_Korean: 차별과 고통없는 세상에서 다시 만나기를….

Name: Dialog_Act0706_Text1
Text_English: We stopped Daniel but the power of Absolute Darkness is still growing.
Text_Korean:
다니엘 님을 막는데 성공했지만 절대 어둠의 힘은
점점 커지는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0706_Text2
Text_English: As the flow of light remaining in Elisium disappears, its power weakens.
Text_Korean:
엘리시움에 남아 있는 빛의 흐름이 사라지면서
그 힘이 약해지고 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0706_Text3
Text_English: The power of light is disappearing because Elisium is being corrupted by Seeds of Death.
Text_Korean:
빛의 힘이 사라지는 것은 앨리시움을 오염시키고 있는
죽음의 포자 때문이에요.

Name: Dialog_Act0706_Text4
Text_English: Without the light in Elisium, Ramiel may be completely consumed by Absolute Darkness.
Text_Korean:
앨리시움의 빛이 사라진다면 라미엘 님은 절대 어둠에게
형체도 없이 먹혀 버릴지도 몰라요.

Name: Dialog_Act0707_Text1
Text_English:
The closer we get to the top, the worse the corruption becomes.
I think there are more Seeds of Death.
Text_Korean:
상층부에 가까워질수록 오염이 심해지고 있어요.
죽음의 포자가 많아지는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act0707_Text2
Text_English: Seeds of Death are here too…?
Text_Korean: 죽음의 포자가 이런 곳까지…?

Name: Dialog_Act0707_Text3
Text_English:
The power of darkness is so strong….
Why is Absolute Darkness staying quiet?
Text_Korean: 이토록 강렬하게 어둠이 드리우고 있는데 절대 어둠은 왜 웅크리고 있을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0707_Text4
Text_English: Maybe Absolute Darkness is waiting for something?
Text_Korean: 절대 어둠은 어쩌면 뭔가 기다리고 있는 게 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0708_Text1
Text_English:
The power of light is getting weaker.
Maybe there’s more to it than I thought.
Text_Korean:
빛의 힘이 약해 지는 것 같아요.
뭔가 더 감춰져 있는 게 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act0708_Text2
Text_English:
It seems he’s planning to kill all angels.
This is too horrible.
Text_Korean:
모든 천사들을 없애 버릴 셈인가 봐요.
이건 너무 잔혹해요.

Name: Dialog_Act0708_Text3
Text_English:
It’s strange. The power of light is getting weaker.
We must hurry.
Text_Korean:
이상해요. 빛의 힘이 약해지는 게 점점 빨라지고 있어요.
서둘러야겠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0709_Text1
Text_English: The evil power from the Seeds of Death is particularly strong here.
Text_Korean: 이곳의 죽음의 포자에서 나오는 사악한 힘은 특히 강해요.

Name: Dialog_Act0709_Text2
Text_English: I have received word from Gaius that the others are safe, so you needn't hold back.
Text_Korean:
피신해 있는 가이우스 님으로부터 다른 분들도
무사하다는 연락이 있었어요. 마음껏 싸우세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0709_Text3
Text_English:
Absolute Darkness will be waiting past here.
Please, you must win this final battle.
Text_Korean:
이곳만 지나면 절대 어둠이 기다리고 있을 거예요.
운명의 전투에서 꼭 승리하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0709_Text4
Text_English: Only your victory can restore Elisium and save Ramiel.
Text_Korean: 그대의 승리가 엘리시움을 되돌리고 라미엘 님을 구할 수 있어요.

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text1
Text_English: Remember that you carry the ties with all you have encountered on this journey.
Text_Korean: 그대가 쌓아온 모든 인연이 함께 한다는 것을 기억하세요.

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text2
Text_English: A mortal dares to stand before perfect light and darkness…?
Text_Korean: 필멸의 존재 따위가 완벽한 빛과 어둠에게 대항하다니…

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text3
Text_English: Let me award you for your bravery. You will fight eternally within the Shackles of Time.
Text_Korean:
가상한 용기에 선물을 주마.
넌 시간의 굴레에서 영원히 싸워야 할 것이다.

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text4
Text_English: Mortal creature, face the destiny of death….
Text_Korean: 필멸의 존재여, 죽음의 운명을 따르라…

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text5
Text_English: The time has finally arrived.
Text_Korean: 드디어 때가 도래했군.

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text6
Text_English: We must hurry!
Text_Korean: 쫓아가야해요!

Name: Dialog_Act0710_Text7
Text_English: The true apocalypse begins!
Text_Korean: 이제 진정한 파멸의 시작이다!

Name: Dialog_Act2101_Text1
Text_English: The resurrected demons are much stronger. Be careful.
Text_Korean: 부활한 악마들이 더욱 강력해졌으니 조심하십시오.

Name: Dialog_Act2101_Text2
Text_English: You can free the entrance if you defeat the demons that guard the area.
Text_Korean:
이곳을 지키는 악마를 물리치면 입구 지역을
해방시킬 수 있습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2102_Text1
Text_English: Other regions were also ambushed by these demons….
Text_Korean:
실은 다른 지역들도 부활한 악마들에게
모두 빼앗겼습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2102_Text2
Text_English: I wonder what it was that resurrected and empowered them….
Text_Korean: 악마들을 부활시키고 강하게 만든 원인이 의문입니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2102_Text3
Text_English: We must find out soon. The fate of our world depends on it!
Text_Korean: 의문을 풀지 못하면 세계를 되찾기 어려울 것 같습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2103_Text1
Text_English: There appears to be some source of power that’s interacting with the demons.
Text_Korean:
찾아낸 약간의 정보에 의하면 악마들에게
어떤 힘이 작용하고 있다고 합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2103_Text2
Text_English: The source seems to react every time a demon is defeated.
Text_Korean:
악마들을 물리치면 그 힘의 반응을 확인할 수
있다고 합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2103_Text3
Text_English: The outcome of this battle may help us save the world!
Text_Korean:
지금의 전투는 세계의 탈환과 동시에 수수께끼를
푸는 것이기도 합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2104_Text1
Text_English: We need more information to figure out what power is behind all this.
Text_Korean: 상황을 이렇게 만든 힘을 파악할 단서가 부족합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2104_Text2
Text_English: Maybe we can get more clues as we reclaim the other invaded regions.
Text_Korean:
지역을 탈환할수록 그 힘에 대한 많은 단서를
얻을 수 있게 됩니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2104_Text3
Text_English: Your victory is imperative for the future of our world!
Text_Korean:
당신의 승리가 세계와 우리의 시간을 되돌릴 수
있을 것입니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2105_Text1
Text_English: If this power is capable of resurrecting the dead, who knows what else it can do….
Text_Korean:
악마가 아닌 존재까지 부활시키다니
알 수 없는 힘이 점점 두렵습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2105_Text2
Text_English: The pain and suffering it’s brought upon our world is unforgivable.
Text_Korean: 이런 끔찍한 시련이 닥치는 게 원망스럽습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2105_Text3
Text_English: If we stand together, we can endure and overcome the darkness!
Text_Korean: 잘 버텨왔던 저희가 무너지지 않도록 도와주십시오.

Name: Dialog_Act2105_Text4
Text_English: I cannot believe there’s a human that can defeat me…
Text_Korean: 날 쓰러뜨리는 인간이 있다니….

Name: Dialog_Act2106_Text1
Text_English: The weight of this dark power is unbearable…
Text_Korean:
저는 점점 두려워집니다.
부활한 어둠의 힘이 이 정도라니…

Name: Dialog_Act2106_Text2
Text_English: If we only had more Ether, these demons wouldn't stand a chance.
Text_Korean: 혹시 새로 나타난 물질인 에테르를 알고 계십니까?

Name: Dialog_Act2106_Text3
Text_English: With the right Ether in our hands, darkness would tremble before us.
Text_Korean:
신기한 힘이 있다고 하니 손에 넣는다면
강해진 어둠에 대항할 힘이 생길 것입니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2107_Text1
Text_English: Gaius says we should feel the dark power grow as we get closer to Caligula.
Text_Korean:
칼리굴라에게 가까워지니 점차 강한 힘의 파장이
감지된다고 합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2107_Text2
Text_English: This intensity… I can barely withstand this amount of power!
Text_Korean:
제가 안일했던 것 같습니다.
병사인 저는 감당할 수 없는 힘이 느껴집니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2107_Text3
Text_English: Impressive! In the midst of this chaos, I'd forgotten how truly powerful you are, hero.
Text_Korean:
이런 기운이 느껴지는데도 꿋꿋하시다니…
당신의 대단함을 잠시 잊었던 것 같습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2108_Text1
Text_English: Rahel’s curse has spread. Even I can feel its terror.
Text_Korean:
여기저기 라헬의 저주가 퍼져 있습니다.
제가 느낄 정도로 지독합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2108_Text2
Text_English: That chill… it feels like Rahel is watching us.
Text_Korean:
등골이 서늘합니다.
어디선가 라헬이 지켜보는 것 같습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2108_Text3
Text_English: We are getting closer. Keep an eye out for Rahel!
Text_Korean:
점점 가까워지고 있습니다.
죽음을 거스른 라헬을 조심하십시오.

Name: Dialog_Act2109_Text1
Text_English: The dark power continues to grow stronger. We must be drawing near the center of Luemos.
Text_Korean:
알 수 없는 힘은 사악한 게 틀림없습니다.
강력한 에테르를 찾거나 만드셔야 합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2109_Text2
Text_English: We are close to the location where Lord Alfrid was lost.
Text_Korean: 곧 당신이 영주님의 죽음을 목격한 곳에 도착합니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2109_Text3
Text_English: Let us reclaim this area so that his soul may rest in peace.
Text_Korean:
이곳을 되찾아 잠들어 계신 영주님의 넋을
위로해 주십시오!

Name: Dialog_Act2110_Text1
Text_English: There’s a message from Sir Gaius.
Text_Korean: 가이우스 님께서 부탁하신 말이 있습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2110_Text2
Text_English: He says we must identify the dark power in order to understand how the demons are being resurrected.
Text_Korean:
힘의 파장을 알아낸다면 악마들의 부활도
파악할 수 있다고 하셨습니다.

Name: Dialog_Act2110_Text3
Text_English: The final battle has come. Let’s give it all we got!
Text_Korean:
마지막 관문입니다! 결전을 준비하십시오!
음? 뭔가 예전에 누군가 말했던 것 같은…

Name: Dialog_Act2201_Text1
Text_English:
The demons that corrupted the forest have returned!
They brought us so much trouble before….
Text_Korean:
숲을 타락시켰던 악마들이 부활하다니
예전의 고난이 떠올라 막막하네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2201_Text2
Text_English: I wonder where this unknown power came from?
Text_Korean:
시간과 공간을 뒤튼 알 수 없는 힘의 파장은
왜 나타난 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2201_Text3
Text_English:
Did that wave of power resurrect the darkness?
I’m glad you’re on our side.
Text_Korean:
정말 힘의 파장이 어둠을 부활시킨 걸까요?
이럴 때 그대가 있어 든든하네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2202_Text1
Text_English:
It reminds me of when I was reunited with Nisse.
I felt frightened, yet relieved at the same time.
Text_Korean:
니스와 다시 만났을 때가 떠오르네요.
두려움과 안도감을 동시에 느꼈었지요.

Name: Dialog_Act2202_Text2
Text_English:
We ran into Ghost here…
I’m glad he’s not here anymore.
Text_Korean:
이곳에서 고스트와 마주쳤었는데…
지금은 나타나지 않아 다행이에요.

Name: Dialog_Act2202_Text3
Text_English:
I feel corrupted energy nearby…
Could Ghost have been resurrected as well?
Text_Korean:
타락의 기운이 느껴져요.
나타나지 않았을 뿐 고스트도 부활한 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2203_Text1
Text_English:
I see traces of Ghost.
I can feel his corrupted power within the demons.
Text_Korean:
고스트의 흔적이 보이는군요.
타락의 힘이 악마들에게서 느껴져요.

Name: Dialog_Act2203_Text2
Text_English:
I can’t sense the energy of the fairies at all!
I hope Ghost didn’t get to them already….
Text_Korean:
요정들의 기운이 전혀 느껴지지 않아요.
이미 고스트에게 당한 것은 아닌지…

Name: Dialog_Act2204_Text1
Text_English:
This is the place where Lilith informed us of the danger.
Back then, I just wanted to run.
Text_Korean:
이곳에서 릴리스 님이 위기를 알리셨었지요.
그때 저는 도망치고 싶었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2204_Text2
Text_English: I’m so sad that Lilith isn’t here to tell us what’s going on.
Text_Korean:
지금은 상황을 알려주실 릴리스 님이
계시지 않는 게 슬프네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2204_Text3
Text_English:
Lilith and the fairies may not be here now,
but I’m glad you’re still here with me.
Text_Korean:
비록 요정도 릴리스 님도 없지만 흔들리지 않는
그대가 있어 정말 다행이에요.

Name: Dialog_Act2205_Text1
Text_English:
This corrupted power! Ghost must be back,
and he’s returned even stronger than before!
Text_Korean:
이 타락의 힘! 고스트의 부활이 확실하군요.
훨씬 강해져서 돌아왔어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2205_Text2
Text_English:
Ghost will show himself soon.
Defeat him and retrieve the wave of power!
Text_Korean:
곧 고스트가 모습을 드러낼 거에요.
반드시 물리쳐 힘의 파장을 찾아주세요.

Name: Dialog_Act2206_Text1
Text_English:
I wonder if Rio is still hiding deep in the forest…
He should show up any moment now….
Text_Korean:
금방이라도 리오가 나타날 것 같은데…
다들 숲 깊은 곳에 있는 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2206_Text2
Text_English: Maybe it’s just me, but it feels like the demons are afraid of us.
Text_Korean:
기분 탓인지 모르겠지만 악마들의 기세가
움츠러든 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2206_Text3
Text_English:
The demons cower in fear of your strength!
You are amazing!
Text_Korean:
그대의 기세에 악마들이 짓눌린 것 같아요.
역시 대단해요.

Name: Dialog_Act2207_Text1
Text_English: Why would the fairies disappear with Gote’s resurrection?
Text_Korean:
악마가 아니었던 고트 님이 부활하고
살아있는 요정들이 사라지다니 이상해요.

Name: Dialog_Act2207_Text2
Text_English:
Unlike Gote, fairies have nothing to do with the power of darkness.
I wonder what’s going on?
Text_Korean:
고트 님과 달리 요정들은 어둠의 힘과 관계가
없어요. 지금의 현상과 관계가 있을까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2207_Text3
Text_English: I’m just glad we didn’t have to face any demons that resembled Lilith….
Text_Korean:
릴리스 님의 형상과 마주친 적이 없군요.
차라리 나쁜 소식이 없어 다행이에요.

Name: Dialog_Act2208_Text1
Text_English: A mysterious wave of power is said to influence time and space.
Text_Korean: 알 수 없는 힘의 파장은 시공에 영향을 준다더군요.

Name: Dialog_Act2208_Text2
Text_English: Maybe that influence erased all other beings and left only darkness.
Text_Korean:
그 영향이 어둠의 힘을 제외한 다른 존재들을
지워버린 게 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2208_Text3
Text_English:
Lilith…she should be here. But what if..?
I don’t see her image, so this can’t be right.
Text_Korean:
설마 릴리스 님도…? 아닐 거예요.
그분의 형상도 나타나지 않았으니 그럴 리 없어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2209_Text1
Text_English: I miss the days when all three fairies were together. We came this far, and yet, there’s no sign of them….
Text_Korean:
세 요정이 모두 모였을 때가 그립네요.
여기까지 왔는데 찾지 못하다니….

Name: Dialog_Act2209_Text2
Text_English: We’re approaching the deepest part of the forest. Hang on for just a bit longer!
Text_Korean:
이곳만 지나면 숲의 가장 깊은 곳이에요.
힘을 내주세요.

Name: Dialog_Act2209_Text3
Text_English: The power of corruption is getting stronger like before! Then… could Lilith be…?
Text_Korean:
점점 강해지는 타락의 힘, 예전과 같아요.
그렇다면 릴리스 님은…?

Name: Dialog_Act2210_Text1
Text_English: What if the Fey Gate is closed? We don’t have any fairies….
Text_Korean:
요정의 문이 닫혀 있으면 어쩌지요?
요정들도 없는데….

Name: Dialog_Act2210_Text2
Text_English: Strange. I can’t find the Fey Gate but it seems we’re connected to Lilith’s dimension.
Text_Korean:
이상해요. 분명 요정의 문이 없는데
릴리스 님의 공간과 연결되어 있는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2210_Text3
Text_English: I wonder if this is due to the distortion of time and space from that mysterious power….
Text_Korean:
알 수 없는 힘의 파장에 의한 시공의 뒤틀림이
만든 상황일까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2301_Text1
Text_English:
Grachia has gone on a separate journey for research.
He says he found something amazing!
Text_Korean:
그라치아는 어떤 연구 때문에 여행을 떠났네.
놀라운 걸 알아냈다며 말이지.

Name: Dialog_Act2301_Text2
Text_English:
It’s been rumored that Grachia is not human,
and that’s why he can use such powerful magic.
Text_Korean:
그라치아가 인간이 아니라는 말도 있네.
그래서 강력한 마법을 사용한다는 소문이지.

Name: Dialog_Act2301_Text3
Text_English:
I thought this as well, but after all we’ve been through,
I don’t know what to believe anymore.
Text_Korean:
나도 그라치아가 인간이 아니라는 생각을 했었네.
이런 곳을 자네와 함께 모험할 수 있을 정도라니….

Name: Dialog_Act2302_Text1
Text_English:
Have you met Sir Gregor before?
I thought Grachia might have mentioned it….
Text_Korean:
이곳에서 그레고르 님과 만났다고 했나?
예전에 그라치아에게 들었네.

Name: Dialog_Act2302_Text2
Text_English: I was looking forward to meeting him after all I’ve heard. It didn’t happen unfortunately….
Text_Korean:
나도 말로만 듣던 그레고르 님과 만나길 바랐다네.
하지만 이뤄지지 않는군.

Name: Dialog_Act2302_Text3
Text_English: On the other hand, maybe it’s a good thing he didn’t show up. Especially as an enemy.
Text_Korean:
그분이 나타나지 않아 한편으로 다행일세.
적으로 만날지도 모르니 말이네.

Name: Dialog_Act2303_Text1
Text_English: I don’t think the zombies were trying to break the seal… Beelzebub is likely already freed.
Text_Korean:
좀비들의 목적이 봉인을 푸는 게 아닌 걸 보니
아마 벨제부브는 해방된 것 같네.

Name: Dialog_Act2303_Text2
Text_English:
Although… If Beelzebub had been released,
I wonder why he’s being so quiet….
Text_Korean:
벨제부브가 이미 해방되었다면 직접 움직이지 않는
이유가 의문일세

Name: Dialog_Act2303_Text3
Text_English:
Something doesn’t seem right with these demons…
They’re not trying to kill us.
Text_Korean:
나는 이곳 악마들의 분위기가 이상하다고 느꼈네.
우리를 쫓아내려는 느낌이었어.

Name: Dialog_Act2304_Text1
Text_English:
Beelzebub is oddly quiet…
He’s not one to usually sit still.
Text_Korean:
벨제부브가 이상하리만치 조용하군.
가만히 있을 성미가 아닌데 말이지.

Name: Dialog_Act2304_Text2
Text_English:
Wait… it wasn’t just Beelzebub.
The others didn’t move either.
Text_Korean:
그러고 보면 벨제부브뿐만이 아니었네.
다들 움직임이 없었지.

Name: Dialog_Act2304_Text3
Text_English: There must be some other motive for those resurrected by the Wave of Power.
Text_Korean:
힘의 파장이 강한 지역의 부활한 자들은
어떤 목적이 있는 게 아닐까 생각하네.

Name: Dialog_Act2305_Text1
Text_English: It’s unnerving to know that the demons are using the system to prevent invasion.
Text_Korean:
침입을 막기 위한 장치를 악마들이 사용하다니
무서운 결과군.

Name: Dialog_Act2305_Text2
Text_English:
It seems like the Poisonous Overseer is watching.
I hope the Power of Light is well hidden.
Text_Korean:
맹독의 감시자가 지켜보는 것 같네.
빛의 힘이 숨겨져 있을지 궁금하군.

Name: Dialog_Act2306_Text1
Text_English:
I sense a great dark being watching over us.
It may be Beelzebub….
Text_Korean:
거대한 어둠이 우리를 지켜보는 것 같네.
벨제부브인 것 같군.

Name: Dialog_Act2306_Text2
Text_English: Strange… Beelzebub is just watching us without a word….
Text_Korean:
이상해. 벨제부브가 침묵한 채 지켜보기만 하다니…
더욱 수상하군.

Name: Dialog_Act2306_Text3
Text_English: It’s definitely odd that Beelzebub isn’t showing us his wrath.
Text_Korean:
벨제부브가 자네에게 분노를 드러내지 않는 점도
매우 이상하군.

Name: Dialog_Act2307_Text1
Text_English: One of the more identifiable changes from the Wave of Power are the stronger demons….
Text_Korean:
한층 강해진 악마들의 부활은 힘의 파장이 불러온
대표적인 현상이라네.

Name: Dialog_Act2307_Text2
Text_English: Not to mention Gote and Lillith both being resurrected with no trace of culprits….
Text_Korean:
또 다른 현상은 고트와 릴리스 님의
이해할 수 없는 부활과 조력자들의 실종이라네.

Name: Dialog_Act2307_Text3
Text_English: And the fact that the demons don’t remember you.
Text_Korean:
현상의 마지막 특징은 자네를 기억하지 못하는
악마들의 반응이겠군.

Name: Dialog_Act2308_Text1
Text_English: The demons of the grave have stopped their invasion of Elisium, thanks to you.
Text_Korean:
무덤의 악마들도 엘리시움의 침공을 멈췄다고 하네.
자네 덕분일세.

Name: Dialog_Act2308_Text2
Text_English: I hope there is some sort of clue to help us solve this….
Text_Korean:
현상의 원인을 파악할 수 있는 중요한 단서가
있었으면 좋겠군.

Name: Dialog_Act2308_Text3
Text_English: Although, I’m worried we won’t be able to handle the truth behind what is happening.
Text_Korean:
혹시라도 단서를 통해 알아낸 사실을 우리가
감당할 수 있을지 걱정이네.

Name: Dialog_Act2309_Text1
Text_English: I am pathetic compared to Sir Gregor.
Text_Korean: 그레고르 님을 생각하니 나 스스로가 한심하네.

Name: Dialog_Act2309_Text2
Text_English: I was so worried about the clue that I wasn’t prepared at all….
Text_Korean:
단서의 무게를 걱정하고 있었네만
내 각오가 부족했던 것 같네.

Name: Dialog_Act2309_Text3
Text_English: But seeing you fight, hero, gives me courage.
Text_Korean: 자네가 싸우는 모습이 나에게 용기를 주고 있네.

Name: Dialog_Act2310_Text1
Text_English: There’s another being that has yet to appear the High Priest of Death.
Text_Korean:
그동안 모습을 보이지 않은 존재가 또 있군.
바로 고위 죽음의 사제일세.

Name: Dialog_Act2310_Text2
Text_English: Dark beings are being resurrected, but the High Priest has yet to appear….
Text_Korean:
모든 어둠의 존재가 부활했음에도 나타나지 않다니
어떻게 된 거지?

Name: Dialog_Act2310_Text3
Text_English: For the time being, however, let’s focus on Beelzebub.
Text_Korean:
일단 복잡한 것은 생각하지 말게.
한층 강해진 벨제부브에게 집중해주게.

Name: Dialog_Act2401_Text1
Text_English:
I’m so glad you’re with me now
just like you were with me at Soul Castle.
Text_Korean:
함께 영혼의 성을 누볐던 게 생각나네요.
그때처럼 그대가 있으니 든든해요.

Name: Dialog_Act2401_Text2
Text_English:
Hmm...That’s very strange.
I don’t feel any souls around.
Text_Korean:
매우 이상하네요.
영혼들의 기운이 조금도 느껴지지 않아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2401_Text3
Text_English: Could it be… That the Goblin Magician took them all?
Text_Korean: 설마… 고블린 술사에게 모두 잡혀간 건 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2402_Text1
Text_English: Could it be... Did the Goblin Shaman capture them all?
Text_Korean:
가이우스 님께 영혼들이 사라졌다는 정보를
알려드렸어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2402_Text2
Text_English: I have sent the word to Gaius about the missing souls.
Text_Korean: 지금 일어나고 있는 현상과 관련이 있는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2402_Text3
Text_English: It must have something to do with the current phenomenon.
Text_Korean:
용감했던 베르타 님의 모습이 그립네요.
지금의 싸움이 베르타 님께 위로가 되기를….

Name: Dialog_Act2403_Text1
Text_English:
I miss Bertha the brave.
I hope our battle will give her some comfort….
Text_Korean:
베르타 님은 부활하지 않은 것 같아요.
내심 기대했는데….

Name: Dialog_Act2403_Text2
Text_English: It’s frustrating that strong demons are showing up instead of the friends who helped us.
Text_Korean:
우리를 도와주셨던 분들은 나타나지 않고
강해진 악마들만 나타나니 억울하네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2403_Text3
Text_English: That’s right! Gaius reported that the demons we’re facing now aren’t resurrected beings.
Text_Korean:
아참! 가이우스 님께 들은 정보예요.
지금 악마들은 부활한 것이 아니라더군요.

Name: Dialog_Act2404_Text1
Text_English: If the demons were resurrected, what creature are we fighting?
Text_Korean:
악마들이 부활한 것이 아니라면 우리는 어떤 존재와
싸우고 있는 걸까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2404_Text2
Text_English: Come to think of it, some of the demons looked different than before.
Text_Korean: 그러고 보니 모습이 달라진 악마들도 있었어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2404_Text3
Text_English: But Caligula, Beelzebub and Lilith looked very much the same….
Text_Korean:
하지만 칼리굴라나 벨제부브, 릴리스 님은
달라지지 않은 것 같은데…

Name: Dialog_Act2405_Text1
Text_English: Unlike before, I can’t sense any trapped souls.
Text_Korean: 전과 다르게 영혼들이 갇혀 있지 않은 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2405_Text2
Text_English: I can’t sense any souls here either.
Text_Korean: 이곳에서도 영혼의 기운을 전혀 느낄 수 없어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2406_Text1
Text_English: I’m fearful that Azrael might suddenly show up again.
Text_Korean: 아즈라엘 님이 예전처럼 갑자기 나타날까 두렵네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2406_Text2
Text_English: I think we’re getting closer to the wave of power from Soul Castle.
Text_Korean: 영혼의 성에 있는 힘의 파장에 가까워지는 것 같아요.

Name: Dialog_Act2406_Text3
Text_English: The wave of power is getting stronger. It’s quite unnerving.
Text_Korean: 점점 힘의 파장이 강하게 느껴져요. 왠지 무섭네요.

Name: Dialog_Act2407_Text1
Text_English: The Goblin Shaman has been quiet... I guess it wasn’t the one hunting souls.
Text_Korean:
그러고 보니 고블린 술사가 잠잠했어요.
그가 영혼을 사냥한 게 아닌가 봐요.

Name: Dialog_Act2407_Text2
Text_English: I thought the souls disappeared but perhaps they were never here to begin with.
Text_Korean:
영혼들은 사라진 게 아니라 이곳에 처음부터
존재하지 않았던 것 같은 느낌이에요.

Name: Dialog_Act2407_Text3
Text_English: Even if it isn’t hunting for souls, the fate of the Goblin Shaman has already been sealed.
Text_Korean:
영혼을 해치지 않았다 해도 고블린 술사에게는
정해진 운명을 선사해야 해요.

Name: Dialog_Act2408_Text1
Text_English: No news from Gaius or the Magic Council...
Text_Korean: 가이우스 님과 마법 의회로부터 소식이 없네요….

Name: Dialog_Act2408_Text2
Text_English: What if the information they found out is so horrible that they can’t handle it?
Text_Korean:
혹시 알게 된 정보가 감당하기 어렵고 무서운
것이면 어쩌지요?

Name: Dialog_Act2408_Text3
Text_English: I wonder what form Azrael will take? I hope we don’t run into him.
Text_Korean:
아즈라엘 님은 어떤 모습으로 나타날까요?
사실 마주치지 않았으면 좋겠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2409_Text1
Text_English: Something is off... It feels like we’re being watched.
Text_Korean:
뭔가 이상해요.
우리를 감시하는 것 같은 시선이 느껴져요.

Name: Dialog_Act2409_Text2
Text_English: We’re still being watched. I wonder if it’s Azrael?
Text_Korean:
감시의 눈길이 사라지지 않네요.
혹시 아즈라엘 님이 아닐까요?

Name: Dialog_Act2409_Text3
Text_English: I’m suddenly reminded of Bertha. Let’s try harder for her sake.
Text_Korean:
베르타 님이 떠오르네요.
그분을 위해서라도 더 힘을 내도록 해요.

Name: Dialog_Act2410_Text1
Text_English: I, I’m scared. I can feel presence of Vulcanus and Azrael.
Text_Korean:
두, 두려워요.
불카누스와 아즈라엘 님의 기운이 느껴져요.

Name: Dialog_Act2410_Text2
Text_English: The wave of power is very intense. We’re close to unveiling the truth.
Text_Korean:
힘의 파장이 가장 강렬하군요.
비밀에 근접하고 있으니 용기를 내겠어요.

Name: Dialog_Act2501_Text1
Text_English: Strange… Thought Nidhogg was defeated when his castle fell.
Text_Korean:
이상해. 분명 천공성이 붕괴하는 걸 보고
니드호그가 패배했다고 생각했는데 말이야.

Name: Dialog_Act2501_Text2
Text_English: So… Nidhogg may have returned… Scary stuff, but exciting times, this is….
Text_Korean:
니드호그가 돌아왔을 수도 있겠어.
두려운 일이지만 왠지 뜨거워지는군.

Name: Dialog_Act2502_Text1
Text_English: Vivian most definitely was beautiful… and also popular.  She was very kind to me…  Sad news indeed….
Text_Korean:
아름답고 강한 비비안은 인기가 많았지.
나에게는 친절했어… 애석하군.

Name: Dialog_Act2502_Text2
Text_English: I can’t bear the thought… Make it swift…  Don’t make it too painful for her.
Text_Korean:
차마 난 보고 싶지 않군. 비비안을 부탁해.
너무 고통스럽지는 않게….

Name: Dialog_Act2503_Text1
Text_English: I don't understand, Everything appears to be the same… but it’s a different world…?
Text_Korean:
나는 이해가 안 돼.
모든 게 그대로인 것 같은데 다른 세계라니…

Name: Dialog_Act2503_Text2
Text_English: Everything, but Elisium, is just an illusion…?! How...?
Text_Korean:
엘리시움을 제외하고 전부 다른 세계라는 뜻인가?!
어찌 이럴 수가…?

Name: Dialog_Act2503_Text3
Text_English: Must study those Force Waves… That’s the only way back to our world… Must focus….
Text_Korean:
힘의 파장을 분석해서 우리 세계로 돌아가야 해.
집중해야겠어.

Name: Dialog_Act2504_Text1
Text_English: I remember just how quick Aveline was… Death would always come before they had a chance to react.
Text_Korean:
아벨린의 재빠른 움직임이 떠오르는군.
적이 죽음을 인식하기 전에 처치했었지.

Name: Dialog_Act2504_Text2
Text_English: I know this Aveline is not the same person I knew from our world… Yet… it still saddens me…
Text_Korean:
이곳의 아벨린이 다른 존재라지만 같은 모습에
마음이 흔들리는군.

Name: Dialog_Act2504_Text3
Text_English: Gift her an eternal rest… Please….
Text_Korean:
이곳의 아벨린에게도 편안한 잠을 안겨줘.
내 부탁하지.

Name: Dialog_Act2505_Text1
Text_English: This Bereth is just as filthy as ours. Hiding like a maggot!
Text_Korean: 얄팍하게 숨은 꼴이 이 세계의 베레스도 똑같군.

Name: Dialog_Act2505_Text2
Text_English: Bereth must pay. Make it quick, but painful.
Text_Korean:
베레스는 정말 구역질 나는 녀석이야.
빨리 끌어내어 해치웠으면 좋겠군.

Name: Dialog_Act2506_Text1
Text_English: I do not carry an ounce of pity.  Wipe out all those demons.
Text_Korean:
이곳의 악마들에게 웃음이 나는군.
자네 같은 영웅의 습격을 받고 있으니 말이야.

Name: Dialog_Act2506_Text2
Text_English: Awfully pleasant watching you destroy the darkness! Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha!!!
Text_Korean:
목적을 이루고 평화롭게 사는데 자네가
뒤집어버리고 있는 셈이 아닌가? 하하하.

Name: Dialog_Act2506_Text3
Text_English: Yes, I can see you getting stronger. Darkness will yield to the Light.
Text_Korean:
역시 어둠은 쓸어버려야지.
그리고 분명 자네도 강해지고 있어.

Name: Dialog_Act2507_Text1
Text_English: You don’t have to believe me… But, Daniel and I were able to hold our own when arm-wrestling Jean.
Text_Korean:
믿기지 않겠지만 나는 다니엘과 더불어
진의 팔씨름 상대였어.

Name: Dialog_Act2507_Text2
Text_English: I wonder what Jean is like here… Perhaps, meek… like a slug?  Hahaha!
Text_Korean:
이곳의 진은 어떤 성격일지 궁금하군.
